abstract: Boeing on Tuesday sold 15 of its next-generation 787 jets to S7 Airlines, one of the largest private operators in Russia.
snippet: Boeing on Tuesday sold 15 of its next-generation 787 jets to S7 Airlines, one of the largest private operators in Russia.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, May 29 — Boeing sold 15 of its next-generation 787 jets to a private Russian airline today in a deal valued at about $2.4 billion, Boeing’s largest sale in the former Soviet Union.

headline.main: Boeing Makes a $2.4 Billion Sale of 787s in Russia

abstract: The deal was valued at about $2.4 billion, Boeing’s largest sale in the former Soviet Union.
snippet: The deal was valued at about $2.4 billion, Boeing’s largest sale in the former Soviet Union.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, May 29 — The Boeing Company sold 15 of its next-generation 787 jets to a private Russian airline on Tuesday in a deal valued at about $2.4 billion, Boeing’s largest sale in the former Soviet Union.

headline.main: Boeing Sells 15 Dreamliners to Russian Airline
headline.print_headline: Boeing Sells 15 Dreamliners to Russian Airline
